question:
you recentely receved a letter from a freind asking for advice about whether to go to college or to try tp get a job. you think she should get a job.


write a letter to this friend. in your letter 
- Say why she would not enjoy going to college 
- explain why getting a job is a good idea for her 
-suggest types of jobs that would be suitable for her
text: Hope this letter finds you well and I am writing this letter in response to your request for the advice on next move in your career. I know, it is not easy to ignore and go away from studies, but on the other hand,  you have such  remarkable technical stuff which would help you to get a phenomenal salary in the competitive industry.

Since I know about your's family economic situation and I strongly recommend you to do any job  considering your family's economic situation  also you must look after your home needs and parent's medical requirements as well. If you could get a good job by this month and you will be cleared all bad debits as your father cannot do and pay  any payments.

As you obtained a master's degree with distinction marks from a reputed university and I think you must start applying for jobs in  management-level jobs and I am sure that you will get it very soon with your strong hardcore skillsets.  Once you get a breakthrough in your search and then,  nobody can stop you from anywhere as you are good at crisis management handling and smooth execution of the business processes.
I look forward to hearing good news very soon in your job search. I hope you will it very soon.
